instruction: Give instructions on how to cook an omelette.
output: To make an omelette, crack two eggs into a bowl, add a splash of milk and a pinch of salt. Whisk the ingredients until blended. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add butter to the pan to coat, then pour in the egg mixture. Cook until the edges are set and golden. Use a spatula to fold the omelette in half, then remove from heat and slide onto a warm plate. Enjoy!
